tdd.name: TDD Development
tdd.prompt:
Implement {feature} using Test-Driven Development.

Process:
1. Write a failing test for the next piece of functionality
2. Implement minimal code to make the test pass
3. Run all tests to verify
4. If any tests fail, fix the code and retry
5. Refactor if needed while keeping tests green
6. Repeat until feature is complete

Output <promise>DONE</promise> when all tests are green and feature is complete.

bugfix.name: Bug Fixing
bugfix.prompt:
Fix bug: {description}

Steps:
1. Reproduce the bug to confirm it exists
2. Identify the root cause through debugging
3. Implement a fix
4. Write a regression test to prevent recurrence
5. Verify the fix works and no new issues introduced
6. Run full test suite

Output <promise>FIXED</promise> when bug is resolved and tests pass.

refactor.name: Code Refactoring
refactor.description: Improve code structure without changing behavior
refactor.prompt:
Refactor {component} for {goal}.

Requirements:
1. All existing tests must continue to pass
2. Make incremental changes
3. Run tests after each change
4. If tests fail, revert and try a different approach
5. Commit when tests are green
6. Continue until refactoring goal achieved

Output <promise>COMPLETE</promise> when refactoring is done and all tests pass.

feature.name: Feature Implementation
feature.description: Build a new feature from scratch
feature.prompt:
Build {feature}.

Requirements:
{requirements}

Process:
1. Break down into small implementable steps
2. Implement each step
3. Write tests (aim for >80% coverage)
4. Run tests and fix any failures
5. Verify feature works as expected
6. Document the feature

Output <promise>SHIPPED</promise> when feature is complete, tested, and documented.

debug.name: Deep Debugging
debug.prompt:
Debug issue: {description}

Approach:
1. Add logging/debugging statements to track execution
2. Reproduce the issue
3. Analyze logs and identify problem area
4. Form hypothesis about root cause
5. Test hypothesis
6. If hypothesis wrong, form new one and repeat
7. Once root cause found, implement fix
8. Verify fix resolves issue

Output <promise>RESOLVED</promise> when issue is fixed and verified.

optimize.name: Performance Optimization
optimize.prompt:
Optimize {component} for {metric}.

Process:
1. Establish baseline performance metrics
2. Profile to identify bottlenecks
3. Implement optimization
4. Measure performance improvement
5. If target not met, try different optimization
6. Ensure tests still pass
7. Repeat until target achieved

Output <promise>OPTIMIZED</promise> when performance target is met.
